messages.subject: "other" list....was not responsible for others feelings
messages.msgSnippet: The conversation about the other list needs to stop. It s not helping anyone understand unschooling philosophies better. If you re going to post wild claims
messages.messageBody:
The conversation about the "other list" needs to stop.
It's not helping anyone understand unschooling philosophies better.

If you're going to post wild claims about getting "reamed" at that list, expect to be called on it, as the moderators at UD are also here. I am a former moderator at that list, and it simply serves another purpose, very different from this list. Not better or worse, just different.

I'm glad those of you that don't care for that style are enjoying this new list, but saying negative things about any other list is not what this one is about. So please refrain.
There ARE lists that have been started just to whine about UD, so you can do that if you wish. Please just don't do it here.

Thank you,

Ren


Learn about unschooling at:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolingbasics/
